markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Collar of Empathy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=404)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 604 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn collar (companion) and worn bracelet (you)

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ornate collar of intertwined leather strips of contrasting colors is paired with a bracelet of a similar construction. When you wear and invest the bracelet and your companion wears and invests the collar, you gain a stronger connection to each other. You and your companion can always sense each others’ emotional states and basic physical wants and needs.

<document level="2" id="action-231" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Collar of Empathy
